title: She
lyrics:
She, she screams in silence
A sullen riot penetrating through her mind
Waiting for a sign
To smash the silence with the brick of self-control
Are you locked up in a world that's been planned out for you?

Are you feeling like a social tool without a use?



Well scream at me

Until my ears bleed

And I'm taking heed

Just for you



She, she's figured out

All her doubts were someone else's point of view

Waking up this time

To smash the silence with the brick of self-control



Are you locked up in a world that's been planned out for you?

Are you feeling like a social tool without a use?



Well scream at me

Until my ears bleed

And I'm taking heed

Just for you



Are you locked up in a world that's been planned out for you?

Are you feeling like a social tool without a use?



Well scream at me

Until my ears bleed

And I'm taking heed

Just for you



Well scream at me

Until my ears bleed

And I'm taking heed

Just for you
